about_the_game:
Stranded in a welcoming paradise, a mysterious force prevents any attempt at escaping this haven. Explore the island and its abyss, face not-so-dangerous foes, gather abilities, and overcome the obstacles and puzzles in your path to figure a way out! 

Havenlocked offers: 

  • A twin-world system for puzzling nonlinear exploration! Swap your position between the worlds to reach remote and inaccessible places!

  • More than 30 enemy types!

  • More than 10 items and their upgrades!

  • Multiple interconnected dungeons, using the twin-world system!

  • At least 5 hours of gameplay!

  • Hundreds of screens to explore!

  • Many secrets!

  • Not a single word!

  • A side game of dozens of new nonogram puzzles!

  • Virgin pina colada!

Havenlocked is the sequel to Master Key but you don't need to have played the former.

It borrows items and enemies from Master Key, and introduces new ones too. 

Havenlocked is different in many aspects and design choices, including an easier base difficulty. But like Master Key, it will not tell you what to do and will let you explore completely unguided.

Check it out on

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: > 2010
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • OS: > 2010
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Havenlocked

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Stranded in a strange tropical paradise, you must find a way to escape, but things may be deeper than they seem. Havenlocked is a 1bit top-down adventure focusing on item-based exploration of two intertwined worlds! Explore and uncover the many secrets of the haven and its abyss.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Czech, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Basque, Bangla, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Welsh, Gujarati, Georgian, Hausa, Hindi, Hebrew, Igbo, Irish, Icelandic, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kyrgyz, Konkani, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Urdu, Uzbek, Uyghur, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Persian, Quechua, Kinyarwanda, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Telugu, Valencian, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu, Scots
